author: Paul Evans
comment: You mean you built a time piece out of an Android?!

author: Bri Robertson
comment: But please let us have some options such as screen on time, change colours, change layout between month and day.....

author: Adrian Burns
comment: Would be much better if you could choose to display the full face in ambient mode. It looks awful in black and white.
title: Great idea but...
